caseTitle: Regional Police Officer, Dera Ghazi Khan Region, etc v. Riaz Hussain Bukhari
tagline: Discussion: (1) In the time barred petitions filed by the Government, administrative delays due to lengthy procedure cannot be considered sufficient cause. (2) No preferential treatment can be accorded to Government Departments for condoning the delay. (3) Law aids those who are vigilant but not those who are sleeping or slumbering. (4) SOP (PLD 2003 Journal 95) made out for this purpose has not been implemented.
